'''''Beyond Bree'' June 1981''' is a journal published by the [[Tolkien Special Interest Group of American Mensa]].

==Contents==
* Name changed to "Beyond Bree"
* "Orphans" by N. Martsch
* "Fantasy in Real Life - The Ten-foot Pole"
* Quiz
* Bakshi film
* Science Fiction Booh Club
